id: The Matt Whitaker Problem							The Matt Whitaker Problem
paragraph:
National ReviewHe seems a capable guy and most of what has been thrown at him is nonsense, but it’s hard to believe that the White House knew about this or focused on it before the president appointed him. Trump should get someone with more stature and credibility as soon as possible.NR's afternoon roundup of the day's best commentary & must-read analysis.
